channel.title: Blogs on Eliezer de Souza da Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Eliezer de Souza da Silva

item.title: Sampling from Dirichlet Distribution using Gamma Distributed Samples
item.description: There is an algorithm to generate Dirichlet samples using a sampler for Gamma distribution for any \( \alpha > 0 \) and \( \beta > 0 \).
